name: 类型
description: pick one of the values of research paper, review, meta-analysis, comments, correction, ...

name: 简述
description: Use a short sentence to describe the main content of the article.

name: 创新点
description: Explain the innovation points of this article.

name: 不足
description: Explain the limitations of this article.

name: 研究目的
description: Briefly explain the research purpose or field of this article.

name: 研究对象
description: Briefly explain the research objects of this article.

name: 领域
description: pick one of the values of computer vision, natural language processing, machine learning, digital pathology, ...

name: 病种
description: pick one of the values of lung cancer, prostate cancer, cardiovascular disease, geriatric disease, ...

name: 技术
description: what kind of technique is used in this paper, e.g. NGS, ONT, RNA-seq, methylation sequencing, ...

name: 模型
description: which model is used in this paper, e.g. CNN, LSTM, GAN, ...

name: 数据类型
description: what kind of data is used in this paper, e.g. image, text, video, ...

name: 样本量
description: how many (and what kind of) samples has been involved in this research

name: 工程工具
description: pick one of the values of CRISPR-Cas9, TALEN, ZFN, Gibson Assembly, Golden Gate Assembly, BioBrick, iGEM, etc. If multiple tools used, list all separated by comma

name: 宿主生物
description: specify the host organism used for engineering, e.g. E. coli, S. cerevisiae, B. subtilis, mammalian cells, plants, etc. If multiple hosts used, list all separated by comma

name: 回路设计
description: describe the synthetic biological circuit or pathway designed, e.g. toggle switch, oscillator, logic gate, biosensor, metabolic pathway, etc.

name: 应用领域
description: pick one of the values of medicine, agriculture, environment, energy, materials, food, industrial biotechnology, etc. If multiple fields, list all separated by comma
